title: --exclude-from (in combination with --include-from) doesn't seem to work in my case
body:
Hi there,

I'm trying to sync my SOME applications folder on my mac with dropbox. I've manage to make it work using an include-from filter. But then I keep getting a lot of noise about thumbs.db and .ds_store files and I'm trying to quiet that down. The -q flag doesn't seem to be doing anything about that, and using the exclude-from as posted below is also not causing those warnings/errors to go away.

```
~/rclone/rclone sync -q --include-from include-applications.txt --exclude-from exclude-applications.txt /Applications remote:#MAC/BACKUP/Applications
```

here's my include-applications.txt (usually contains way more than one app but now only has one for testing)

```
4K Video Downloader.app/**
```

and here's my exclude-applications.txt

```
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store
```

and here's the console output

```
~/rclone  ./syncDropboxApplications.sh
~/rclone/rclone sync -q --include-from include-applications.txt --exclude-from exclude-applications.txt /Applications remote:#MAC/BACKUP/Applications
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/Versions/.DS_Store: File name disallowed - not uploading
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/Versions/.DS_Store: Corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 6148 vs 0
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/Versions/5/.DS_Store: File name disallowed - not uploading
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/Versions/5/.DS_Store: Corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 6148 vs 0
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/.DS_Store: File name disallowed - not uploading
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtGui.framework/.DS_Store: Corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 6148 vs 0
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtNetwork.framework/.DS_Store: File name disallowed - not uploading
2016/01/06 17:06:21 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtNetwork.framework/.DS_Store: Corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 6148 vs 0
2016/01/06 17:06:22 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtNetwork.framework/Versions/.DS_Store: File name disallowed - not uploading
2016/01/06 17:06:22 4K Video Downloader.app/Contents/Frameworks/QtNetwork.framework/Versions/.DS_Store: Corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 6148 vs 0
2016/01/06 17:06:26
```
